Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Extends the effectiveness of certain provisions relating to the authority of Plandome Manor to enter into contracts to sell delinquent tax liens
Summary: Extends the effectiveness of certain provisions relating to the authority of the village of Plandome Manor to enter into contracts to sell delinquent tax liens or to pledge such liens as collateral for a loan.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 280 of the laws of 2016 authorizing the village of Plandome Manor to enter into a contract to sell or pledge as collateral for a loan some or all of the delinquent liens held by such village to a private party or engage a private party to collect some or all of the delinquent tax liens held by it, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
